quotes.name: John Adams
quotes.quote: There are few people in this world with whom I can converse.

quotes.name: Ben Affleck
quotes.quote: I'm always described as cocksure or with a swagger, and that bears no resemblance to who I feel like inside. I feel plagued by insecurity.

quotes.name: King Edward Ⅵ
quotes.quote: I will say with certain intention, that I will see my laws strictly obeyed, and those who break them shall be watched and denounced.

quotes.name: Tina Fey
quotes.quote: If you want to make an audience laugh, you dress a man up like an old lady and push her down the stairs. If you want to make comedy writers laugh, you push an actual old lady down the stairs.

quotes.name: Francis Sears
quotes.quote: There is no concept in the whole field of physics which is more difficult to understand than is the concept of entropy, nor is there one which is more fundamental.
